trans-unit.source: Represents the hosted combo box control in a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Representa o controlo de caixa de combinação alojada num <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The DataGridViewComboBoxEditingControl class is a specialized type of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox> that implements the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.IDataGridViewEditingControl> interface, allowing it to be hosted in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell> when the cell is in edit mode.
trans-unit.target: A classe de DataGridViewComboBoxEditingControl é um tipo especializado de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>que implementa o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.IDataGridViewEditingControl>interface, permitindo que alojada num <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell>quando a célula está no modo de edição.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.IDataGridViewEditingControl> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>

trans-unit.source: When a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell> is in edit mode, you can retrieve the DataGridViewComboBoxEditingControl through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.EditingControl%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control.
trans-unit.target: Quando um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell>está no modo de edição, pode obter DataGridViewComboBoxEditingControl através o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.EditingControl%2A>propriedade o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>controlo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.EditingControl%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell>

trans-unit.source: Handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.EditingControlShowing> event to perform custom initialization of the editing control when a cell enters edit mode.
trans-unit.target: Processar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.EditingControlShowing>eventos para efetuar a inicialização personalizada do controlo de edição quando uma célula introduz o modo de edição.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.EditingControlShowing>

trans-unit.source: To customize the display characteristics of the control, set the properties of the object returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewEditingControlShowingEventArgs.CellStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property rather than setting the properties of the control returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewEditingControlShowingEventArgs.Control%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: Para personalizar as características de apresentação do controlo, definir as propriedades do objeto devolvido pelo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewEditingControlShowingEventArgs.CellStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade em vez de a definição das propriedades do controlo devolvido pelo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewEditingControlShowingEventArgs.Control%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewEditingControlShowingEventArgs.Control%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewEditingControlShowingEventArgs.CellStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxEditingControl"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxEditingControl"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: This default constructor sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.TabStop%2A> property to `false`.
trans-unit.target: Este construtor predefinido define o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.TabStop%2A>propriedade `false`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.TabStop%2A>

trans-unit.source: Application code typically will not explicitly create instances of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxEditingControl> class, because this is performed automatically when the containing <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell> is created.
trans-unit.target: Código da aplicação, normalmente, não irá explicitamente criar instâncias do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxEditingControl>classe, porque este é automaticamente executado quando a contendo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell>é criado.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxEditingControl>

trans-unit.source: Changes the control's user interface (UI) to be consistent with the specified cell style.
trans-unit.target: Altera a interface do controlo de utilizador (IU) para estar consistente com o estilo de célula especificada.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Font%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackColor%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ForeColor%2A> properties of the control align with the corresponding properties of the `dataGridViewCellStyle` parameter value.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Font%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackColor%2A>, e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ForeColor%2A>Propriedades do controlo alinharem com as propriedades correspondentes do `dataGridViewCellStyle` valor do parâmetro.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ForeColor%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackColor%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Font%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle"></xref> to use as a pattern for the UI.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle"> </xref> para utilizar como um padrão para a IU.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> that contains the combo box control.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref> que contém o controlo de caixa de combinação.

trans-unit.source: This property is automatically set when a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell> is created within a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> or added to a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>.
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade é automaticamente definida quando uma <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn>ou <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell>não foi criado numa <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>ou adicionado a um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> that contains the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell"></xref> that contains this control; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if there is no associated <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref> que contém o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell"> </xref> que contém este controlo; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> se houver não associado <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the formatted representation of the current value of the control.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a formatados representação do valor atual do controlo.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.Text%2A> property contains the actual data contained in the control.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.Text%2A>propriedade contém os dados reais contidos no controlo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.Text%2A>

trans-unit.source: This data is the string shown in the text box portion of the control.
trans-unit.target: Estes dados são a cadeia apresentada na parte de caixa de texto do controlo.

trans-unit.source: In contrast, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxEditingControl.GetEditingControlFormattedValue%2A> method returns the formatted representation of this string.
trans-unit.target: Em contrapartida, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxEditingControl.GetEditingControlFormattedValue%2A>método devolve a representação formatada desta cadeia.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxEditingControl.GetEditingControlFormattedValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: Because a combo box uses plain text strings, these two properties are essentially the same.
trans-unit.target: Como uma caixa de combinação utiliza cadeias de texto simples, estas duas propriedades são essencialmente iguais.

trans-unit.source: An object representing the current value of this control.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto que representa o valor atual deste controlo.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the index of the owning cell's parent row.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o índice da linha de principal do proprietário da célula.

trans-unit.source: The row index of the column headers row is -1.
trans-unit.target: O índice de linha da linha dos cabeçalhos de coluna é de -1.

trans-unit.source: The row index of a shared row is also -1.
trans-unit.target: O índice de linha de uma linha partilhada também é de -1.

trans-unit.source: The index of the row that contains the owning cell; -1 if there is no owning row.
trans-unit.target: O índice da linha que contém a célula proprietário; -1 se não houver nenhuma linha proprietário.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the current value of the control has changed.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se o valor atual do controlo foi alterado.

trans-unit.source: The EditingControlValueChanged property is set to `true` to specify that the owning cell's value has changed, and the cell may need to be updated to reflect this change.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade EditingControlValueChanged está definida como `true` para especificar que o valor da célula proprietário foi alterado e a célula poderá ter de ser atualizadas para refletir esta alteração.

trans-unit.source: The owning cell or table will reset this property to `false` after it has updated itself.
trans-unit.target: A célula ou tabela proprietário irá repor esta propriedade para `false` depois atualizou-se em si.

trans-unit.source: When the control is initialized, this property is set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: Quando o controlo é inicializado, esta propriedade está definida como `false`.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the value of the control has changed; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o valor do controlo tiver sido alterado; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the specified key is a regular input key that the editing control should process or a special key that the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> should process.
trans-unit.target: Determina se a chave especificada é uma chave de entrada regular que deve processar o controlo de edição ou uma oferta especial de chaves que o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref> deve processar.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control calls this method to determine whether to handle an input key or let the editing control handle it.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>controlo chama este método para determinar se deve processar uma entrada chave ou permitir que o controlo de edição lidar com o mesmo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: This method returns `true` if `keyData` includes the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Keys> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Keys> values or if the drop-down list is displayed and `keyData` includes the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Keys> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Keys> values.
trans-unit.target: Este método devolve `true` se `keyData` inclui o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Keys>ou <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Keys>valores ou se é apresentada a lista de lista pendente e `keyData` inclui o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Keys>ou <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Keys>valores.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Keys> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Keys> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Keys> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Keys>

trans-unit.source: This method also returns `true` if `dataGridViewWantsInputKey` is `false`.
trans-unit.target: Este método devolve também `true` se `dataGridViewWantsInputKey` é `false`.

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, this method returns `false`.
trans-unit.target: Caso contrário, este método devolve `false`.

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Keys"></xref> values that represents the key that was pressed.
trans-unit.target: Uma combinação bit a bit de <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Keys"> </xref> valores que representa a chave que foi premida.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to indicate that the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> control can process the key; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>para indicar que o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref> controlo pode processar a chave; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the specified key is a regular input key that should be handled by the editing control; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se a chave especificada é uma chave de entrada regular que deve ser processada pelo controlo de edição; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the cursor used during editing.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o cursor utilizado durante a edição.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Cursor"></xref> that represents the cursor image used by the mouse pointer during editing.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Cursor"> </xref> que representa a imagem de cursor utilizada pelo ponteiro do rato durante a edição.

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the formatted value of the cell.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o valor formatado da célula.

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorContexts"></xref> values that specifies the data error context.
trans-unit.target: Uma combinação bit a bit de <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorContexts"> </xref> valores que especifica o contexto do erro de dados.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Object> that represents the formatted version of the cell contents.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Object>que representa a versão do conteúdo da célula de formatado.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.SelectedIndexChanged"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Gera o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.SelectedIndexChanged"> </xref> eventos.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.EventArgs> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.EventArgs>que contém os dados do evento.</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Prepares the currently selected cell for editing.
trans-unit.target: Prepara a célula seleccionada actualmente para edição.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to select all of the cell's content; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>para selecionar todo o conteúdo da célula; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the cell contents need to be repositioned whenever the value changes.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se o conteúdo da célula tem de ser reposicionadas sempre que o valor é alterado.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> in all cases.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>em todos os casos.
